title: f/s: t206 joe mcginity VG w/mk

posts.post_title: f/s: t206 joe mcginity VG w/mk
posts.post_content:
found this at the bottom of the drawer.  card is VG with a "453" in pencil on the back.  excellent chance to play picasso here with an art eraser.  i won't because i got a C in arts&craft 7th grade.

SOLD

would also accept mid 80's stars jsa psa/dna cards...esp topps donruss fleer clemens, strawberry, griffey jr, ud chipper jones
